1490010.name: Phoenix Squadron : Azure Stars
1490010.description:
~ STORY ~

Take flight into the skies of Alsydia, a vibrant world featuring a variety of locales ready to explore, both in the sky and on land, Leo A’rvara, Andrew Rein, Fai Tio, and Grim Lupia are apart of the Elite Cerilian Kingdom Squadron : Phoenix Squadron, Years after the great war the Akinsu Federation readies themselves to march on the world once again...
But even with history possibly repeating itself, something else lurks behind the curtains...

~ DESCRIPTION ~


Phoenix Squadron : Azure Stars supports online COOP in Arena Quests, instanced areas with a specific objective the player needs to complete, alongside Arena Quests, Players can take part in Boss Fights, a 4 player battle against a fearsome foe (Story related quests will need to be done in single player first before they can be taken with other players)
In the open worlds and smaller open lands you can explore, players can undertake a variety of quests, some of which provide you with followers, special characters that can accompany the players squadron as their 5th or 6th squadron member.
Skills / Arts are special abilities that can be equipped on aircraft or (arts) on ground units (AKA the main cast / followers), up to 3 active and passive skills / arts can be equipped at a time, Active Skills / Arts either require a recast time or a certain amount of Resonance, Resonance is accumulated into a pool per Resonance Art / Skill, this pool is filled up via the primary Resonance pool, if the primary pool is empty the arts wont fill up until the main pool regenerates enough.
